name: GetPlayerObjectPos
description: Get the position of a player object (CreatePlayerObject).

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player whose player object to get the position of.

params_body.name: objectid
params_body.description: The object's id of which you want the current location.

params_body.name: &Float:X
params_body.description: A float variable in which to store the X coordinate, passed by reference.

params_body.name: &Float:Y
params_body.description: A float variable in which to store the Y coordinate, passed by reference.

params_body.name: &Float:Z
params_body.description: A float variable in which to store the Z coordinate, passed by reference.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. The player and/or the object don't exist.

 The object's position is stored in the specified variables.
pawn_code:
new Float:x, Float:y, Float:z;
GetPlayerObjectPos(playerid, objectid, x, y, z);
